overview: A new film from Francesco Fanelli that features highly erotic content! Elena Grimaldi is a nice, easy going and enterprising woman. One day she is aware that her husband Marc has fled, and that the causes of his departure are deviant events in which both the beautiful wives of Marcâ€™s colleagues are involved. Murky secrets come to light, passionate intrigues of sex and power. Elena will find herself at the center of a spiral of perversion and betrayal that she never expected
title: The Fascination of Sin
